description.b: This is a checklist used to help programmer adjust the generated domain classes.
Remove the web pages and css, js files that unrelated to the rest project.
Remove the generated Sitemash filter and filter map from the web.xml
Find the generated domain classes, change the imported jackson pacakge to new version: com.fastel.jackson.annotation....
In the One to Many class, comment the @JsonIgnore annotation
Change the One to Many setting from cascadeType. REMOVE to cascadeType.ALL
In the generated classes, change the id generation to automatic UUID generation.
